titles.title: Justice for Americaâ€™s Veterans and Survivors Act of 2025
Justice for Americaâ€™s Veterans and Survivors Act of 2025

A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to require the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to submit to Congress each year an annual report that contains data and information on the causes of deaths among veterans, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
